src:
Los mejores memes del debate electoral a 5: del adoquín de Rivera a la 'mamada' de Iglesias

04 Nov 2019, 22:26

El debate a 5 en TVE está dando lugar a muchos memes en Internet parodiando la cita y sin dejar títere con cabeza. Sin duda Albert Rivera, presidente de Ciudadanos, logró ser la imagen del debate, una vez más, con su ya famoso adoquín.
Pero hubo mucho más..., en este caso involuntario, como el lápsus linguae de Pablo Iglesias cuando quiso denunciar las 'manadas' de jóvenes que violan mujeres pero dijo "mamadas", tampoco se libró del humor ácido el horario intempestivo en el que programaron el debate:
text:
The best memes of the electoral debate at 5: from Rivera's cobblestone to the 'blowjob' of Iglesias

04 Nov 2019, 22:26

The debate at 5 on TVE is giving rise to many memes on the Internet parodying the date and without leaving a puppet with a head. Undoubtedly Albert Rivera, president of Citizens, managed to be the image of the debate, once again, with his already famous cobblestone.
But there was much more ..., in this involuntary case, such as Pablo Iglesias' lapse linguae when he wanted to denounce the 'herds' of young people who rape women but said "blowjobs", neither did the untimely schedule in which the untimely schedule in which They scheduled the debate:
